content.question: A magnetic force is exerted on a moving charged object. Which of the following statements must be true?

choices.label: The charged object is near a bar magnet.
The charged object is near a current-carrying wire.
The charged object is in a magnetic field.
The charged object is in both an electric and a magnetic field.

content.answer: The charged object is in a magnetic field.

skill.text: 3.B: Apply an appropriate law, definition, theoretical relationship, or model to make a claim.
